title: How to Prepare Hot Water and Lemon

steps.headline: Cut a piece of lemon peel from a the fresh lemon.
Place the lemon peel into a cup or mug.
Pour the boiling water over the lemon peel.
steps.description: Allow to steep briefly, then enjoy this simple but refreshing drink.

text: Cut a piece of lemon peel from a the fresh lemon.  Place the lemon peel into a cup or mug.  Pour the boiling water over the lemon peel. Allow to steep briefly, then enjoy this simple but refreshing drink. Finished.
